dogsim
Class FitBit

java.lang.Object
  dogsim.FitBit

public class FitBit
extends java.lang.Object

FitBit class represents wireless transmitters attached to Dog collars while present in the Arena. The FitBit maintains a reference to the attached Dog in order that it may retrieve information it is responsible for transmitting, such as x and y-coordinates, dog ID, heart rate and temperature.

Author:
Karel Bergmann
See Also:
Resty, Arena, Dog

Method Detail

transmit

public void transmit()
Transmits Dog information to a RESTful web service using the Resty library. This is accomplished by using the DogState helper class to extract pertinent information from the attached Dog.

See Also:
Resty, DogState, Dog
